segments.text: Hi , Sarah . The results of questionnaire have come out . We need to discuss it together then write a research report .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 30 % of the people are attracted by the style . Buyers always pay great attention to packing . In my opinion , these goods didn't sell well merely because of the poor packing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . And how about the price ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Almost 30 % of the consumers can â€™ t accept the price . Maybe we should lower our price a little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I agree with you . We should add our opinions to the research report .
segments.speaker: S2
